title: Powder Box, 1952-166-112, ca. 1902
markings:
900
1000 ,  triangle and illegible oval with F, anvil mark on back, import mark with beetle.
description: Glass bowl with curved sides, the bottom part spiral fluted, the sides engraved with leafy c-scrolls.  Mounted in silver band to which is hinged the silver repousse  cover, with two iris in high relief.  Inside gilded.
